name: NEW!! Scalloped shorts & pixie set
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

This sweet little set is all girl. Made from a mohair blend and available in lavender(as shown), cream, nutmeg(as shown) and pale green. Set includes bonnet and shorties. Thanks so much to Glow Portraits and Loni Bourne Photography for these beautiful images. sz. nb

name: Lacy bonnet & wrap set-2 colors
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Made from a mohair blend lacy weight yarn in the softest shade of cream and lavender. Set includes bonnet and matching wrap. Beautiful images from Glow Portraits. Bonnet is NB size and wrap measures approx. 15x15 with tonnes of stretch. Lavender hat does NOT include flower.

name: Santa's little helper
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

This little hat is perfect for all of your Christmas themed shoots. Hat is made from 100% merino wool in bright red and white. A little bit of texture separates the colors. Sz. Nb Thanks so much to Donnelly Photography for the beautiful image.

name: Chunky crochet mini blankets-2 color options
description:
Current turnaround is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Gorgeous chunky blanket can be used as a basket filler, draped or as a wrap. Made from 100% peruvian wool. Measures approx. 17/18x20. Gorgeous image from Donnelly Photography.

name: Pixie hat and shorties
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Sweet little set is part of our purely baby collection. Knit from a baby alpaca and is seriously the softest wool i have ever worked with. Includes pixie bonnet and shorts. The perfect addition to your prop stash and will last through all the trends as it is classic and timeless. Sz. NB Shown in sand. Gorgeous photo by Glow Portraits

name: Striped beanie
description:
Current production time is approx. 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Sweet little beanie is shown in charcoal, orange and cream with custom colors available. Stripes will ALWAYS be in style. Made from a merino wool and a staple for sure. Sz. NB Gorgeous image from Jennifer Nace Photography.

name: Knit pixie and shorties
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Shown in smudge. The Keri set is knit from a peruvian wool blend with cream ties. Bonnet is available pixie style (as shown) or rounded back. Thanks so much to Keri Myers Photography for the beautiful image. Sz. NB

name: Baby short pants-4 color options
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping. 

Sweet little pants are right on trend in a variety of soothing colors. Hits mid calf. Matching bonnet available, please inquire. SZ.NB Thanks so much to Monica Neira Studios for the beautiful images.

name: Suri Sleepy cap and shorts
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Knit from gorgeous alpaca/merino in creme and suri alpaca in toasted marshmallow, this set is sure to please!. Set includes shorts and sleepy cap. Sz. NB. Gorgeous image by Son Kissed photography.

name: Granny Square Blanket
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping

I absolutely adore the way this blanket turned out. Shown in an array of blues and edged in white. Custom colors available. Thanks so much to Donnelly Photography for the stunning image! Measure approx. 20x18

name: Textured sleepy cap & pants
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.


This little set is sooo cute. Made from a merino blend with tons of texture and right on trend. Shown in yellow, blue, charcoal and cream but custom colors are available. (up to 4) Please leave color choice in notes to seller. If none are chosen, colors in photo will be sent. Sz. NB Thanks so much to Caralee Case Photography for the beautiful image.

name: Bumflap pants
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Sweet little pants in beige with a cream bum flap and finished with buttons. Sz. NB Pants are full length.
Thanks so much to Monica Neira Studios for the beautiful image.

name: Basketweave Pixie and Shorts Set
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Gorgeous Pixie hat and pants set done in neutrals is PERFECT for your next newborn shoot. Made from a merino/ alpaca blend in cream and caramel and finished with an intricate basket weave texture makes this set a go-to for years to come. Sz. NB Thanks so much to Newborn Daydreams Photography for the beautiful image.

name: Chunky Pixie Hat-2 color options
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

This little hat is so sweet. Knit chunky from an alpaca wool, it is sooo soft against baby's skin. Shown in powder blue, coming soon in a variety of colors. Thanks so much to Kelly Ryden for this precious image. Sz. NB

name: Chunky Mini Blanket
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

This wrap is is absolutely gorgeous. Knit chunky in a beautiful alpaca. The softest wrap you will ever own. Use as a wrap(shown), Mini blanket, basket filler, or layer. measure apprrox. 18x18. Shown in cream. Thanks so much to Kelley Ryden and Tracy Raver baby posing for this beautiful image.

name: Diamonds Pixie and Shorts
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Sweet and simple with a gorgeous diamond stitch in the perfect shade of grey. Made from a merino/alpaca blend with more colors coming soon. This set will be a favorite for years to come. Sz. NB Thank-you to Newborn Daydreams Photography for this stunning image.

name: Subtle Stripes Pixie
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

NEW from our Purely.baby collection the subtle stripes pixie is perfect for your next shoot! Knit from a luxurious merino/alpaca blend in shades of charcoal, heather grey, and creme. Sz. NB. Beautiful image from Jennifer Christiansen Photography.

name: Bonnet & Leggies set
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Knit from a luxurious variegated merino in shades of pink, cream, naturals, and green. Flower is on a clip and may vary. Sz. NB. Thanks so much to Son Kissed Photography for the stunning image.

name: Slouchy Beanie
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

So cute and trendy. Sweet little slouchy hat done in a luxury alpaca/merino blend in light blue and grey. Two small wooden buttons finish it off. Sz. NB. Gorgeous image by Jennifer Nace Photography.

name: Marble Blue Bonnet
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Sweet little bonnet is knit from a blue "marbled" merino wool. A ridged front adds texture and definition. Sz. NB. Thanks so much to Son Kissed Photography for the stunning image.

name: Fall aviator
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Sweet little hat in all the colors of Fall!! Perfect for those who like a deep, rich color palette.Finished with a tree branch button. Thanks so much to Chaunva Lecompte Photography for this gorgeous image. Sz. NB

name: Organic Aviator
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

*sigh* I love this little hat. Knit chunky in a 35%organic cotton/ 65% wool blend. Burlap, jute, and treebranch button finish it off. Thanks so much to Donnelly Photography for the beautiful image.

name: Beanie and short pants
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

This 2 tone beanie and pants is perfect for those who like to keep it simple. Made from a soft merino in charcoal and heather grey. SZ. NB. Thanks so much to the fabulous Kelley Ryden and Tracy Raver baby posing for the beautiful photo.

name: Sleepy cap-3 soft color options
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Sweet little stocking cap in charcoal, blue, white and yellow. Made from a merino/wool blend. Perfect for baby's first photos and if you are a photographer, you will find yourself reaching for this piece time and time again. Sz. nb. Thanks so much to Caralee Case, Donnelly Photography, and Little Angels by Medine for the beautiful images.

name: 2 Small Stars Beanie
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

This lil' hat is done in all natural fibers. A pale blue mohair at the top and a 65% wool, 35% cotton blend at the bottom. Topped off with 2 teeny star buttons. Sz. NB
Thanks so much to Sugarlily Studios for the stunning images.

name: Natural Bonnet and short pants
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Knit from a wool blend and finished with a burlap tie and wooden beads. The organic knit baby pants are all the rage in newborn photography, and these have sweet little elements to make them unique.Comes with a matching bonnet., Pant can be purchased alone for $36 if interested, please convo. Shown in dark chocolate. Sz. NB only. Thanks so much to Sweetyheart Photography for the beautiful image.

name: Classic Bonnet in blush
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Made in the most beautiful shade of pink and finished with 3 glass pearls. Also available in cream and pale blue. Made from a luxurious alpaca. Sz. NB Thanks so much to Donnelly Photography for the stunning photo.

name: Tri-colored textured beanie
description:
Current production time is approx. 4-5 weeks before shipping.

This sweet little beanie has all of my FAVE things!!! Stripes, texture, a tree branch button atop a beautiful newbie head. Custom colors available but if none are in notes to seller, hat as shown will be sent. Thanks so much to Donnelly Photography for this gorgeous image. Sz. NB

name: Cable Knit Hat
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Done in the most luxurious yarn of alpaca and merino. Knit solid and cabled all the way around. Sz. NB. Thanks so much to Keri Myers Photography for the beautiful image.

name: Pop of color beanie
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Knit chunky from a wool/organic cotton blend in white and orange. Other color available. Email for availability. Stunning photo from Urbanalli Photography. Sz. Nb

name: Braided tail sleepy cap(2 color options)
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Sweet little sleepy cap knit from 100% merino wool. Sz.NB Thanks so much to Kelley Ryden and Tracey Raver Baby Posing and Crystal Lee Photography for the beautiful images.

name: Knotty Top Hat
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Sweet and simple little knotty top hat in the perfect neutral shade of stone. Made from a merino/alpaca blend is next to baby skin soft. Sz. NB Thanks so much to Kelly Ryden for this stunning image.

name: Soft Stripes Pixie
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

This little hat is knit in the softest suri alpaca in calming greys, blues and creams. Sz. NB Thanks so much to Kelley Ryden and Tracer Raver Baby Posing for this beautiful image.

name: Daisy Bonnet(2 color options)
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Sweet and all things girly! knit from a silk, mohair blend. A pretty daisy stitch frames perfect little faces and adds a touch of something to this beautiful hat. Sz. Nb. Thanks so much to Kelley Ryden and Chaunva Lecompte Photography for the beautiful images.

name: 2 Tone Bear Bonnet
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

This little bonnet is knit from a cream and blush pink alpaca. Topped off with ears. Sz. NB
Thanks so much to Living Dreams Photography for the beautiful image.

name: Brushed Suri Bonnet
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Knit from 2 different types of luxury wools. Merino in the from and brushed suri in the back. Light and airy as a spring day. Finished with 3 small grey flower. Flowers may vary due to stock. Sz. NB Thank-you to Living Dreams Photography for the gorgeous image.

name: Pearl Bonnet
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Sweet little bonnet knit from a cream alpaca wool. Finished with blush pink chiffon ties and pale glass pearls. Sz. NB Thanks so much to Glow Portraits for the beautiful image.

name: Lattice Bonnet
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

This bonnet is knit from 100% merino. A beautiful stitch adds interest and texture to a simple piece. Shown in steel blue but custom colors are available. Sz. NB Beautiful image by Urbanalli photography for the beautiful image.

name: Single Cable Beanie
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

The simply cable beanie is just that...simple....but sweet. Shown in mocha with more colors coming soon this hat is a classic, timeless piece that will carry your collection through the years. Yarn is made from 100% merino wool. Sz. NB
Thanks so much to Crystal Lee Photography for the stunning images

name: Ribbed Knit Pixie
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Sweet little pixie hat is a part of our simply baby line!! Knit solid in the most wonderful shade of purple. Sz. NB Thank-you so much to Sugarlily Studios for the beautiful photo.

name: Weaves Blanket
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Shown in walnut and chocolate. Custom colors available. Made from 100% peruvian wool. Measures approx 20x14. Perfect as a layer, wrap or draped over baby. Thanks so much to Donnelly Photography for the beautiful image.

name: Simple Beanie
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Knit from a wool roving and finished with a tree branch. Simply sweet. Sz. NB. Thanks so much to Donnelly Photography for the beautiful image.

name: Baby Bear
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

This little hat is so sweet. Knit from a wool blend that has a slight fuzz to it in the most glorious neutral shade and finished with a silk bow and ties. Sz. NB Thank-you so much to Living Dreams Photography for this amazing photo.

name: Rabbit Kisses Pixie(2 color options)
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

The rabbit kisses pixie is made from 100% merino in the most beautiful shade of green. Subtle texture adds interest to an all around beautiful piece. Sz. NB Thanks so much to Loni Bourne Photography.

name: Lacy Pixie (2 color options)
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

This little pixie is perfect for a warm day and all things girly.Made with mohair blend. Handwash gently in cold water, lay flat to dry. NB size. Thanks so much to Glow Portraits for the stunning images. Listing is for 1 bonnet only.

name: Sleepy Cap (2 color options)
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Full of texture and knit from a merino blend, these hats will sure to please if you love color. Sz. NB Thank-you to Caralee Case photography for the beautiful images.

name: Fancy Pants set(2 color options)
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Your baby girl would look so cute in this set!! Crocheted from a merino blend in lavender and pale yellow. A fancy stitch adds texture and interest. Finished with 3 small flowers and silk ribbon accents. Thanks so much to Kimberly G Photography and Chaunva Lecompte Photography for these stunning images. Sz. NB

name: Aviator hat
description:
Current production time is approx. 4-5 weeks before shipping.

I adore this little hat. Knit chunky from a 65% wool, 35% organic cotton yarn. A small ridge adds interest and a tree branch button finishes it off! Sz. NB

Thank-you to Donnelly Photography for this beautiful image

name: Sweater Knit Pixie
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Simple and sweet. The sweater knit pixie is knit from 100% alpaca. Shown in smudge. Sz. NB. Thanks so much to Glow Portraits for the stunning image.

name: Textured Bonnet(4 color options)
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.


 Full of texture and perfect for your newborns photos. Made from 100% merino wool in slightly variegated shades. This will be your go-to bonnet for years to come. Sz. NB.

name: Baby boy cloche hat
description:
Current production time is approx. 4-5 weeks before shipping.

This unique little beanie is knit in the perfect shade of blue. 2 black buttons hold it together. Sz. NB. Thank-you to Urbanalli Photography for the beautiful image. Custom colors available, please inquire.

name: Twists Pixie-2 color options
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Knit from a variegated merino. A simple "twist" in stitches adds texture and interest. Sz. NB Thanks so much to Donnelly Photography for the beautiful image.

name: Classic Bonnets-5 color options.
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Available in 5 delicious colors the classic bonnet is your go-to, you will find yourself reaching for it again and again. Classic and timeless in style made from 100% merino wool with a touch of variegation. Sz. NB Thanks so much to Donnellly Photography for the gorgeous images. Babies are wearing butter and mango.

name: Beanie and leggies set
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Sweet little girl set, beanie and leggies!! Made from a merino wool in the boldest shade of purples and mustard. Finished with a silk bow. Sz. NB Gorgeous image by Jennifer Nace Photography.

name: Vintage Bonnet
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

A simple bonnet with a touch of vintage. Knit from a merino wool and finished with a scallop stitch that frames those sweet little faces. Shown in cream but available in custom colors. Sz. NB Thanks so much to Keri Myers Photography for the stunning image.

name: Joshua Bonnet
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Joshua is the first bonnet for boys in the couture collection. Knit from a sage wool and finished with linen, burlap, and wooden accents. Sz. NB Thank-you to Jennifer Nace Photography for the beautiful image.

name: Small Stripes Bonnet
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

I love bonnets...and stripes...and blue... This bonnet is knit from a wool blend and features small contrasting stripes. Custom colors available. Sz. Nb Thanks so much to Jennifer Nace Photography for the beautiful image.

name: Little boy lamb bonnet
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.


This little lamb is perfect for the new baby boy. Done in a beautiful boucle and edged in chocolate wool. Sz. NB
Thank-you to Pumpkin Pie Photography for the beautiful image.

name: Sunshine Girl
description:
Current turnaround time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

I like to call this little hat the sunshine girl! Made from 100% merino in white and yellow stripes and finished with a sweet fabric bow makes this little hat all girl. Sweet earflaps finish off the sides. Sz. NB Thanks so much to Monica Neira Studios for the beautiful image.

name: Delilah Bonnet
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Delilah is exclusive to our couture collection. Knit from a luxury alpaca/merino blend in a beautiful shade of blue and finished with sequined fabric, satin, and pearls. Thank-you to Jennifer Nace Photography for the lovely image. Sz. Nb

name: Lindley Bonnet
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Lindley is knit from a luxury alpaca/merino blend in cream and sage. A delicate lace stitch frames the face to add texture and definition. Finished with 3 small flowers and silk ties. Flowers may not be exact. Thank-you to Jennifer Nace Photography for the beautiful image. Sz. NB

name: Gabriella Bonnet
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Gabriella is crocheted from a chunky wool in the season's hottest shade..coral. Finished with a white bow, silk ties and teal handmade flower. Sz. NB. Thanks so much to Caralee Case Photography for the stunning images.

name: Avery Bonnet
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.


A gorgeous little crocheted bonnet in buttery yellow, finished with chiffon ties in robins egg clue and a satin bow. Simple and sweet. Thanks so much to Caralee Case Photography for the stunning image. Sz. NB

name: Lillian Bonnet
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Sweet little crochet bonnet in the perfect shade of purple. Finished with 3 purple flowers and chiffon ties. Made from a wool blend. Sz. NB Thanks so much to Caralee Case Photography for the gorgeous image.

name: Layla bonnet
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Layla is knit from Spring's sunniest shade is a wool blend. Finished with a handmade flower of organza and satin. A crystal centre and satin ties finish it off. Crystal may not be exact. Sz. NB. Thanks so much to Jennifer Nace photography for the beautiful image.

name: Londynn Bonnet
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Crocheted from 100% peruvian wool in the perfect shade of peach and finished with silk ties and a coordinating flower. Sz. NB Thank-you to Caralee Case Photography for the beautiful image.

name: Brooke Bonnet
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Sweet little hat is the softest pale pink yarn ever!! Finished with a silver bow and lace ties. Sz. NB. Thanks so much to Jennifer Nace Photography for the beautiful image.

name: Maddison Bonnet
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Maddison is knit from 100% peruvian wool and finished with lavender satin, vintage chiffon, and a silk rosette. Sz. NB Thank-yo so much to Jennifer Nace Photography for this stunning photo.

name: Caralee Bonnet
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

This bonnet is knit from 100% peruvian wool and finished with coral organza, grey satin, and teal lace handmade flowers with silk ties. Sz. Thank-you to Caralee Case Photography for this stunning image.

name: Harper
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

The Harper bonnet is knit from a beautiful cream mohair blend. Finished with chiffon ties, burlap, jute, lace and pearl accent. Simply divine. Thanks so much to Meshelle Photography for the gorgeous image. Sz. NB

name: Edith Bonnet
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Unique and stylish, this baby girl bonnet comes in a pretty shade of kelly green. Finished with a handmade satin bow with a pearl center and silk ties. Sz. NB. Thanks so much to Caralee Case Photography for the stunning image.

name: Lacey Knit Bonnet
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.


This bonnet is made from a luxury merino blend in the prettiest shade of blue. Simple and clean with a lacy stitch framing that little face. White chiffon ties finish it off. Sz. NB. Thanks so much to Jennifer Nace Photography for the stunning image

name: Addison Bonnet
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Addison is knit from a merino/alpaca blend in soft grey. Finished with a handmade flower, pearls, satin ribbon and feathers.. All things girly/. Sz. NB Thanks so much to Jennifer Nace Photography for the beautiful image.

name: Victoria Bonnet
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Victoria is 100% vintage. Knit from a pale purple wool and finished with a handmade lace and chiffon flower. Silk ties complete the vintage look. Sz. NB. Thank-you so much to Jennifer Nace Photography for the stunning photo.

name: Emma Bonnet
description:
Current production time is approx. 4-5 weeks BEFORE shipping.


The Emma bonnet is knit from the prettiest color of peach and finished with a handmade chiffon flower, lace and crystal center. Crystal may not be exact. Sz. NB.
Thank-you to Jennifer Nace Photography for the beautiful photo.

name: Fisherman Set(2 versions)
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Sweet little set includes the hat with bobber and fish on a line, pole not included. Crocheted from an acrylic tweed wool and finished with twine and a bobber. Fish is orange but can be made in custom colorsz. NB

name: Lovesick Puppy
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Lovesick puppy is crocheted from a cream wool and finished with felt and button accents. Sz. NB Thanks so much to Monica Neira Photograpy for the stunning image.

name: Baby girl Lamb
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Baby girl lamb is crocheted from a fluffy whit yarn. Finished with felt ears and a pink bow. Sz. NB. Thanks so much to Monica Neira Photography for the beautiful image.

name: Mousey Mouse
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Crocheted from a grey wool and finished with felt and button accents. Sz. NB Thanks so much to Monica Neira Photography for the beautiful image.

name: Frog Prince
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Crocheted from a wool in green and finished with a yellow crown. Sz. NB. Thanks so much to Monica Neira Photography for the gorgeous image.

name: Skullie beanie
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Little beanie is perfect for your bad boy!! Crocheted in white and edged in grey. Finished with a grey applique. Sz. NB

name: Chunky Aviator
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.  

Little hat is crocheted from a grey/cream wool and finished with felt glasses. Sz. NB Thanks so much to Monica Neira Photography for the gorgeous image.

name: Hunneybear
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.

Little hunneybear is crocheted from a chunky chocolate wool. Finished with a small bee and felt ears. Thanks so much to Monica Neira for the beautiful images. Sz. NB

name: Perfect Puppy
description:
Current production time is 4-5 weeks before shipping.


Crocheted in cream with felt, button and fabric accents. Sz. NB Thanks so much to Monica Neira Photography for the beautiful image.

name: Cable knit leggings
description:
Ready to ship.

Beutiful lacey like cable knit leggings are perfect for the little dancer in your life, to keep little legs warm, or for that extra something to spice up a photo shoot. Fits 5-12 years.
